resources.string: If hang up is enabled, when the game runs in the background or the screen goes to sleep, the game enters the hang up state. You can exit the hang up when the countdown is over or by clicking on the Hang up stop button in the notification bar. In the case of running in hang up for a long time, it is recommended to connect a power supply.
Select the single hang up time when hang up is enabled. Long hang up time may cause unnecessary power consumption. The game macro can also trigger the hang up and determine the total hang up time.

Enabling this function will also enable the [Sound Assistant] function. To temporarily exit the silent state, please press the volume button to adjust the media volume while clicking the Sound Assistant icon to normalize the game volume. To manage Sound Assistant, please go to [Settings - Sound & Vibration - Sound Assistant].
This feature only works in the game

Choose whether or not to refresh the hang up time countdown when you return to the game during hang up time. The positive answer is good for viewing and running a single repetitive task in hang up, while the negative one helps run a complete task in hang up.
The game enters the hang up state when the game runs in the background or the screen goes to sleep
%sThe game has entered the hang up state
"Since the battery power is too low or the power saving mode has been enabled, you can't continue to hang up the game"
"The phone's temperature is too high, and the hang up has been temporarily turned off"
